profileAlternative.name: Meagen Eisenberg
profileAlternative.headline: Chief Marketing Officer at TripActions
profileAlternative.summary:
Transformational leader, advisor and marketer managing customer acquisition to adoption and advocacy with experience at global businesses ranging from startups to mid-market to Fortune 500. 11 successful exits since 2011 as an operator and advisor, including 2 IPOs and 9 mergers and acquisitions.

Strong ability to optimize current business practices quickly, improving poor performance areas while developing new strategic imperatives. Forward thinker leveraging big data and technology to deliver future growth and a sustainable revenue path.

Specialties:
* Deliver worldwide demand generation and lead nurturing programs
* Drive sales enablement and partnering with marketing
* Master at marketing operations, automation, infrastructure and measuring ROI
* Specialize in field marketing strategy and execution
* Automate and streamline marketing processes
* Build high-performing teams

positions.title: Chief Marketing Officer
positions.description:
We believe being there in person is powerful. Fast becoming the default for corporate travel, TripActions is the modern business travel platform that combines the latest AI-driven personalization with unrivaled inventory choice and global 24x7 365 live human support to delight employees, finance leaders and travel managers alike—all while empowering organizations to seize travel as a strategic lever for growth.

Companies deserve a travel solution that takes the pain out of work trips so that their travelers can focus on being there, not getting there. With over 90% traveler satisfaction, learn more about why customers like WeWork, Okta, Lyft, Dropbox, Concentrix, Procore, Box, Hudl, Allbirds, Slack and Strava have made the switch to TripActions at www.tripactions.com
…
see more

positions.title: Board Member
positions.description: G2 Crowd real-time and unbiased user reviews help you objectively assess what is best for your business. G2 Crowd’s mission is to provide the insights business professionals need to gain confidence in their buying decisions and become more successful in their jobs.

positions.title: Founding Advisor
positions.description: An action-oriented approach to address the pipeline from: hiring, founding, investing and leading.

positions.title: Board Member
positions.description: Reactful enables companies to better engage, guide and convert visitors on the web through its powerful machine learning and AI-driven technology. Reactful powers some of the largest brands in the world such as Kimberly Clark, American Greetings and Turner Broadcasting, as well as many other innovative B2B customers.

positions.title: Board Advisor
positions.description: TINYpulse gives leaders the tools to improve culture, employee performance, and engagement.

positions.title: Advisor
positions.description: Branch increases mobile conversion, retention, and engagement through deep linking, user routing, and personalized app experiences.

educations.title: California Polytechnic University - San Luis Obispo

given.text:
Meagen is a very strong marketing executive. I had the privilege of working along her side during one of the most transformative stages of DocuSign's growth. I watched her scale her leadership team to new heights as well as spearhead our demand engine's complete overhaul. The infrastructure, process and sophistication that she was able to create set the foundation for both near term results and long term scalability. She has created a name for herself in demand and marketing leadership that any organization would be very fortunate to have on board. I'd look forward to working with Meagen again and would highly recommend her for any executive marketing leadership position.
…
See more

Meagen is easily one of the brightest, most talented marketers I've had the pleasure to work with. I've followed her career with equal parts admiration and envy for her amazing ability to balance long term vision with a 'roll up her sleeves' focus on results. She's mastered all aspects of B2B marketing, joining a CMO panel one day to talk digital strategy and the next talking with practitioners about tactical campaign improvements to drive ROI. Strong on ideas and armed to the teeth with data that backs them up, Meagen is a marketing tour de force. But best of all, she's just an all around quality person - driven but approachable, good natured but honest and direct.
…
See more

received.text: Paz is an amazing marketer and leader.  And she is loved by her peers and team.  She knows the importance of partnering with the Sales leaders and reps to deliver awareness, demand and pipeline.  Paz not only knows how to set the strategy, but also can execute the plan.  I really enjoyed the time we were able to work together at MongoDB.

I had a wonderful experience working with Gretchen on a purchase in Atherton, CA. She was always responsive in a timely manner, professional, and super diligent. I highly recommend her as a real estate agent to represent any buyer or seller in their important life decisions.

items: Interview with Meagen Eisenberg, VP of Marketing at DocuSign
Webinar: 7 Reasons your prospects think you're boring!
